title: We Are Monsters
description: The Apocalypse has come to the Sugar Hill mental asylum. He’s the hospital’s newest, and most notorious, patient—a paranoid schizophrenic who sees humanity’s dark side.Luckily he’s in good hands. Dr. Eli Alpert has a talent for healing tortured souls. And his protégé is working on a cure for schizophrenia, a drug that returns patients to their former selves. But unforeseen side effects are starting to emerge. Forcing prior traumas to the surface. Setting inner demons free.Monsters have been unleashed inside the Sugar Hill mental asylum. They don’t have fangs or claws. They look just like you or me.
author: Brian Kirk
